items.question: Can I use my photos anywhere?
items.answer: Yes! You have full rights to use the photos you generate for personal and commercial purposes, as long as they comply with our usage policy.

items.question: What images should I upload for the best results?
items.answer: We recommend uploading clear, well-lit images where your face is fully visible. Avoid heavy filters or dark lighting for optimal AI results.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. All uploads and generated images are stored securely and deleted automatically after processing unless you choose to save them.

items.question: Can I request a refund for my purchase?
items.answer: Refunds can be requested within 7 days if there is a technical issue preventing delivery of your AI images. Please contact our support team.

items.question: Which image file types can I upload?
items.answer: We currently support JPG, JPEG, and PNG formats up to 10MB per image.

items.question: Is it possible to request manual edits for my headshot photos?
items.answer: Yes, premium users can request one round of manual edits per order directly from their dashboard.

items.question: Can I request a redo for my headshot order?
items.answer: Yes. If you are unsatisfied, you can request a redo once within 48 hours of delivery.

image_editor_form_info.username: Specifies the username. Used for identification in API requests.
image_editor_form_info.prompt: Enter a description for the image to be generated or modified. Be clear and concise.
image_editor_form_info.image_url: The URL or uploaded image to be processed.
image_editor_form_info.aspect_ratio: Defines the aspect ratio of the output image (e.g., 1:1, 16:9).
image_editor_form_info.output_format: Select the output image format (PNG, JPG, WEBP).
image_editor_form_info.guidance_scale: Determines how closely the model follows the prompt (higher = more consistent).
image_editor_form_info.product_image: Upload the scene image where the product will be placed.
image_editor_form_info.scene: Short description of the scene where the product will appear.
image_editor_form_info.product_placement: Explain how the product should be positioned in the image.
image_editor_form_info.person_image_url: Upload the photo of the person for virtual try-on.
image_editor_form_info.clothing_image_url: Upload the image of the clothing to be tried on.
image_editor_form_info.preserve_pose: If enabled, keeps the original pose while changing clothes.
image_editor_form_info.image_category: Specifies the category (e.g., outfit-generation, background-remove, etc.).

form_editor_add_image.upload_title: Drag & drop or click to upload

editor_form_advanced_title.title: Advanced Settings
editor_form_advanced_title.subtitle: Configure advanced settings to customize your image output.
